rules_text:
[i](As an Arena enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then cast it converted for free.)[/i]
When this battle enters, tap each creature you don't control.
rules_text2: Return each tapped nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text2:
[i]“In every round, there's only a winner and a loser. Which side do you choose?”
—Matthue to Verce[/i]
